txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Black heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature in Agamaur. Bring them to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'Perhaps there is a way that we can save them still. It is good to see that there is still some measure of purity in the hearts of the Free Peoples.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Once noble creatures are now fallen, due to the pride of Men. We must do what we can to aid nature in its recovery.'
Elsa the Bold, at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur, desires black heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature found in Agamaur.
Deliver the black heartwood to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Elsa the Bold to acquire black heartwood from the creatures of nature within Agamaur. You can find Elsa the Bold within the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
Wanted: Black heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature in Agamaur.
